mapper.sql: id AS "id" , category_id AS "categoryId" , pid AS "pid" , pvid AS "pvid" , attr_name_code AS "attrNameCode" , attr_name_business_type AS "attrNameBusinessType" , attr_name_type AS "attrNameType" , attr_value_type AS "attrValueType" , attr_name AS "attrName" , is_search AS "isSearch" , create_user_code AS "createUserCode" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_user_code AS "updateUserCode" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_user_code AS "deleteUserCode" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: id = #{id}, category_id = #{categoryId}, pid = #{pid}, pvid = #{pvid}, attr_name_code = #{attrNameCode}, attr_name_business_type = #{attrNameBusinessType}, attr_name_type = #{attrNameType}, attr_value_type = #{attrValueType}, attr_name = #{attrName}, is_search = #{isSearch}, create_user_code = #{createUserCode}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_user_code = #{updateUserCode}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_user_code = #{deleteUserCode}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_prd_attr_name ( id, category_id, pid, pvid, attr_name_code, attr_name_business_type, attr_name_type, attr_value_type, attr_name, is_search, create_user_code, create_date, update_user_code, update_date, delete_user_code, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{categoryId}, #{pid}, #{pvid}, #{attrNameCode}, #{attrNameBusinessType}, #{attrNameType}, #{attrValueType}, #{attrName}, #{isSearch}, #{createUserCode}, #{createDate}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteUserCode}, #{deleteDate} )
